# Networking

> Standard library networking.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var net = require( '@stdlib/net' );
```

#### net

Standard library networking.

```javascript
var n = net;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

```javascript
console.log( getKeys( net ) );
```
